article.title: SRI Operates Advanced Penetrating Radar in Iraq
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SRI International, Menlo Park, California, was awarded an $18,987,583 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the necessary support, material and equipment to continue operations of an existing advanced penetrating radar system. Work will be performed in Iraq, with an estimated completion date of May 31, 2012. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Vicksburg, Mississippi, is the contracting activity.
